# scss

### Syntax highlighting

```vim
:TSInstall scss
```

### Supported language servers

- cssls
- tailwindcss
- stylelint_lsp
- emmet_ls

### Supported formatters

- prettier
- prettier_d_slim
- prettier_eslint
- prettierd
- stylelint

### Supported linters

- stylelint
